import React from'react';import{Image}from'semantic-ui-react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./styles.css';const Avatar=props=>{let className=props.className,avatar=props.avatar,centered=props.centered,link=props.link;avatar=avatar||'https://i.imgur.com/7o5cwt8.png';// Convert http to https
if(/^http/.test(avatar)&&!/^https/.test(avatar)){avatar=avatar.replace(/^http/,'https');}centered=centered!==null?centered:true;className=className||'avatar';const avatarComponent=React.createElement(Image,{className:className,src:avatar,centered:centered});if(link){return React.createElement(Link,{to:link},avatarComponent);}return avatarComponent;};export default Avatar;
